thread.title: Newsmaker – Steven Tucker: A Lucky Friday 13th
thread.title_full: Newsmaker – Steven Tucker: A Lucky Friday 13th | News24

author: news24.com
title: Newsmaker – Steven Tucker: A Lucky Friday 13th
text:
Little did he know that when he was caving that day, he would step through time
It was Friday the 13th, and a chance step to the side while trying to take a photograph led Steven Tucker to Africa’s richest fossil find in history.
The 27-year-old chartered accountant and auditor had unwittingly stumbled across the cave that led to finding Homo naledi, which was unveiled to the world this week as an extinct relative of humans. It also led him to another career.
Tucker and his friend, Rick Hunter, were on a caving expedition in a remote section of the Rising Star cave system at the Cradle of Humankind.
